trans:
Research and Development Department
) PT Arnott's Indonesia serves as a tool to facilitate development, both in terms of
ingredient
and process. Ingredient development includes formulation, types of flour,
flavour
, and so on. Currently, there is no available SOP for making
cookies
at laboratory scale. SOP for making
cookies
at laboratory scale is a simulation of the condition of making
cookies
throughout the production process from weighing to products being packaged (
packing
). So that the products of
cookies
made at the laboratory scale are identical to the product's results of
cookies
made in the production scale. The objective of this study is to create
Standard Operating Procedure
(SOP) of making
cookies
